target.comment: R4B `RelatedArtifact.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RelatedArtifact.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/related-artifact-type|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/related-artifact-type|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
